app.title: Vibe Template
app.description: A modern React starter with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/UI, Framer Motion, and React Router.

themeProvider.title: Theme Provider
themeProvider.description: Built-in dark mode toggle with system preference detection and localStorage persistence. Based on shadcn's theme implementation using Tailwind's dark mode class strategy.

tailwind.title: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development. Create beautiful designs without leaving your HTML.

framerMotion.title: Framer Motion
framerMotion.description: Production-ready animation library for React. Create fluid animations with minimal code.

shadcn.title: Shadcn/UI
shadcn.description: Beautifully designed components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS. Re-usable components that you can copy and paste into your apps.

reactRouter.title: React Router
reactRouter.description: Client-side routing for React applications. Navigate between views without full page reloads.

lucide.title: Lucide React
lucide.description: Beautiful & consistent icon toolkit for React applications. Over 1000 icons available.

customCursor.title: Custom Cursor
customCursor.description: An interactive custom cursor that replaces the default mouse cursor with animated elements that respond to user interactions.
customCursor.hoverText: Hover over elements to see different states

i18next.title: i18next
i18next.description: Powerful internationalization framework with support for multiple languages, plurals, context, and more.
i18next.sampleText: This is a sample text to demonstrate language switching.
